name: Devilman - Playtest of Tutorial
description:
A simple 2D platformer focusing on movement-based game mechanics. This is a piece of a larger project currently in development, using the visual scripting tool, PlayMaker. . Try out our Tutorial Level and feel free to add a comment. We would appreciate it very much, if you gave us feedback on the prototype: https://goo.gl/forms/pJKLNYIcL2NVYIJG2 

Thank you!

Best Regards

Made by: Jonas Melgaard Jensen, Cornelia Irbo Groth & Sofie Kjær Schmidt

- 1st year game design students.
